About Us

Estate Marketing, established in 2014, is a company that specializes in real estate investment. Real estate investment is an important aspect of building and securing financial stability for individuals and businesses. The ability to invest in a tangible asset like property can provide a stable return on investment, as well as the potential for appreciation in value over time. Real estate investment can also provide a source of passive income through rental income and can be a valuable tool for diversifying an investment portfolio. Real Estate Marketing's team of experts provides valuable guidance and support for individuals and businesses looking to invest in the real estate market, helping them to make informed decisions and achieve their financial goals.

INCORPORATION

Estate Marketing Assets Managements was incorporated on the 25th of October 2014 in the company house registry and registered online as an investment company that deals on the trading of stocks and bonds.

Q3 2017

PRESENTATION

Following the successful incorporation of our company, there was an official presentation of the appointed executives to control the affairs of the company.

Q1 2018

SECURITY

With daily increasing investors, Estate Marketing Assets Managements decided to move it domain to Namecheap hosting, an American web hosting company to ensure high security of our investors data.

Q1 2019

REGISTRATION

Estate Marketing Assets Managements registered and lunched it domain officially to make it possible for individuals, representatives and organizations to easily invest with us from any part of the world.

Q3 2017

REFERRAL PROGRAM

Due to our passion for investors with no much funds, we decided to introduce the referral program to enable investors make more when they refer their friends and follow investors to us.

Q2 2018
